Class XmlParser

Convert an xml file or string to an associative array (including the tag attributes): $domObj = new xmlToArrayParser($xml); $elemVal = $domObj->array['element'] Or: $domArr=$domObj->array; $elemVal = $domArr['element'].

Namespace: core\component\parser
Version: 2.0
Param: Str
$xml file/string.
Located at core/component/parser/XmlParser.php
